title: dunhill | Our Maisons
text: founded 1893 in London, England CEO Matthew Ives store network 83 product lines Ready-to-wear. tailoring, leather goods, accessories and footwear savoir-faire Bespoke tailoring, bespoke leather and made-to-measure Homo Faber 2024: The Journey of Life Reflecting themes of celebration and nature The storied House creates the ‘Alfred Dunhill’ Automotive cocktail case and exhibits iterations of its iconic Aquarium lighter, reflecting the themes of ‘celebration’ and ‘nature’ respectively. Both showcases embody the innovative spirit and meticulous attention to detail synonymous with dunhill. dunhill on social media /
